www facebook com/wilma spielen 980 - http //www ravelry com/people/wilmaspielen for a few parts of the chicken i used the „funny rooster on amigurumi today so when working on the chicken visit https //amigurumi today/amigurumi-funny-rooster-crochet-pattern/ the hat itself is a quick project i think i finished it after 1 5 hours working the chicken parts and attaching them takes more time but all in all it s not a complicated project so just have a go  materials white yarn plus some orange yarn gauge doesn t matter it should fit to an h or i crochet hook yarn leftovers in the colors red black yellow crochet hook according to the yarn used fiberfill tapestry needle abbreviations st - stitch chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet * * - what is written between the stars has to be repeated round round flo - front loops only increase increase decrease decrease half_double_crochet-decrease half_double_crochet decrease single_crochet-decrease crochet 2 single crochets together =single_crochet-decrease note - the beginning chains count as stitch e g 1 chain = 1sc 2 chain = half_double_crochet - for the hat part finish every row by joining with a slip_stitch - for the amigurumi part no joing with slip_stitch at end of row and no chain at the beginning of row work in continuous rounds maybe use a stitch marker to mark the end of a row ©2017 anja welling find wilma spielen on facebook wordpress and ravelry 2 wilmaspielen wordpress com -
